text: Isabar dughiabar gɨrara, Jop zurara akaba amadima, me an dɨpenimɨn izi. Egha me Godɨn damazimɨn zueghasa, a me bagha ofabagh ami. A bar mɨzaraghara dɨkavigh vaghvagh me bagha asɨziba bar isia mɨghɨrir ofabagh ami. A zurara arazir kam gami. A kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, me ti uan navir averiabar aven ti arazir kuram gamua paza Godɨn mɨkemeghama. Egha nɨghnɨzir kam bangɨn, a me bagha ofabagh ami.
